text_block_list.text:
It was my day off, and I was heading to 
catch a movie when suddenly ——

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Oh, Trainer! Are you here for "The Dawn of Horsegirls: 
Toward Untrodden Records" as well?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Hmm? Your reaction suggests you're 
not familiar with this movie at all.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
"The Dawn of Horsegirls" is a biographical series about 
horsegirls who've dedicated their lives to competitive racing.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
While there's probably some dramatization, it beautifully 
captures the emotions of horsegirls as they compete.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
As a trainer, it should be a valuable reference to you. 
I'd recommend giving it a watch if you get the chance.
choice_data_list: Alright, why don't I watch it right now.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Oh, your interest's been piqued already!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Shall we watch it together then? 
Heheh, we can discuss our thoughts afterward!
And with that, the movie began……

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: The struggle with injuries, a miraculous comeback story…

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Not everyone can achieve such a remarkable turnaround. 
But the challenges they face are something we can all relate to.

Just as Symboli Rudolf had mentioned, it was 
an enlightening movie for me as a trainer.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Heheh, right? I'm glad you enjoyed it.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
In which case, you might also like the previous movie. 
If you're interested, just let me know and I'll lend it to you.

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text:
—— Oh, look, look! Just as I thought, it's starting today! 
I've been so excited about this so I remembered～♪

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl B
text_block_list.text:
No way! Being able to see it on the first day is like super lucky♪ 
Ah～ I can't wait to feel the butterflies!!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Hm? Was that one of our students? Well, that's commendable. 
Watching "The Dawn of Horsegirls" on its opening day…

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
… But, "feel the butterflies", was it? I guess some 
are looking for that kind of feeling from this movie.

…… As I glanced around the movie theater, 
I noticed an advertisement for a romance film 
that read: "Now in Theaters!"
choice_data_list: I think they're here to see this.
I think they're here to see this.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Oh, let's see…… "First Love Carrot Cake 
～ Love Is Sweeter Than Carrots ～" …?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Judging by the poster, it seems to be a teen romance movie. 
Maybe it's popular among the students…?
choice_data_list: Want to give it a try?
Want to give it a try?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Huh? I don't mind, but why…?
choice_data_list:
Having the same interests can be 
a great conversation starter.

Having the same interests can be 
a great conversation starter.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: …… I see.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Indeed, having shared hobbies can make conversations 
smoother. Plus, it's easier to connect with someone who 
appreciates your interests.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Right. My difficulty in connecting with the students isn't 
solely because of my personality, it's likely due to differences 
in our interests and preferences as well.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
You're absolutely right. Nothing will begin unless we take action, 
just as the saying goes; "Nothing ventured, nothing gained".

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Sure, let's go grab the tickets now! 
We absolutely have to check it out!

The movie was a bittersweet tale of two 
people who met over a carrot cake in a 
quaint café and gradually fell in love…

The final scene where the heroine grabs the boy's arm as 
he's about to leave and musters the courage to confess 
was particularly impactful.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Watching two movies in a day feels like quite the indulgence.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Yes, I enjoyed it a lot.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
The movie slowly built the characters' relationship in the first 
half, but the final moments were dramatic and emotional ——

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
While there weren't any unique tricks employed, 
the story was crafted meticulously, staying close 
to the emotions of the main character.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
It may not be flashy, but it had a well-crafted plot. 
Mm, I feel like I understand why it's popular among 
the students now.

Symboli Rudolf's impressions were perceptive, but why did I 
get the feeling I just listened to a movie review…?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Huh? I just told you… Was there something strange about it?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Ah, I see what you mean now. You must be talking 
about the main character's peculiar dialogue.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
"Adore her as I do, I shan't open my heart's door to her". 
… Heheh. The usage of "heart's door" and "a-dore" 
certainly caught me off guard.
choice_data_list: Did you not find it relatable?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Relatable…? You mean empathizing with 
the protagonist's romantic journey…?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Regrettably, that perspective never crossed my mind.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Immersing deeper in the excitement by projecting ourselves 
onto the characters' romantic experiences…

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
That aspect might indeed be more significant to most. 
This must be why it is popular among young people.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Well then, I should start appreciating it from that angle as well. 
By doing so, I can share our students' feelings more effectively.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Hahah, you taught me something new again. 
Your perspective is quite enlightening.

… Spending a day with the "Emperor" Symboli Rudolf 
made me feel like I understood her a bit more.
